entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 9. POP 30%
